page.title: 12FOCUS 230
page.content: There is an U.W.C.and they help people who are unemployed they also give out information about benefits.there is a drug support group because as the Constable of Hampshire has stated Leigh Park is one of the worst areas for drug abuse.There is help for adults who have trouble with reading and writing.There are various other groups e.g.a slimming group,an animal rights group and a group for old people,they can have lunch,go on trips and they raise money by having raffles and 'bring and buys'. There is a Citizen's Advice Bureau which deal with consumer problems and another group,Woman's Aid,try and sort out problems between married couples.
